sessionDescription: UX practitioners conduct user research with a generative goal and this requires planning. Understand users' characteristics, aims, and behaviour towards achieving goals. Our goal is to produce designs that improve users' lives. 'Making life easier with User Research'

sessionDescription: Hot tea or coffee with few cookies and a whole lot of small talks

The key to professional success and building a great career is to establish strong relationships over time with people. It is important for today's generation to understand "Networking is Net worth". This session will help you understand why networking as a life skill is essential to succeed in any field. Building a strong network will provide you with opportunities to best prepare for your professional goals. It is essential to understand that networking is a mutually beneficial process. Skills and Competencies can be useful only when the right network is established.
